Detailed Description

Header file for t_search.cc.

In this header file classes and data structures neccessary for proper tree searching are declared. 

 
Enumeration Type Documentation






      

        

          enum Group_status_accuracy
        

      






Possible values accuracy of group status. 


Enumerator: 


gsa_certain 

Certain status ( represents correct evaluation of the group). 




gsa_depth_uncertain 

Uncertain due to depth cutoff ( possible global information loss). 




gsa_alfa_beta_uncertain 

Uncertain due to alfa beta cutoff ( without global information loss). 



















      

        

          enum Node_type
        

      






this enum tells me whether am i in maximizing or minimizing node

Parameters:

  

    
[in] saved_ Reference to Hash_table_item which was saved in the Hash_table_manager::hash_table. 

    
[in] new_ Reference to Hash_table_item which corressponds to actual position.

  

  




Method tests if it is possible to use stored information ( Group_status ) of saved_ Hash_table_item for actual position represented by new_ Hash_table_item. It's similar to operator==.
